00044 <!--reserve specific javascript functions-->
00045 <script type="text/javascript">
00046 function confirmProcess(intReserveID, strTitle)
00047 {
00048     var confirmBox = confirm('<?php echo __('Are you sure to remove reservation for'); ?>' + "\n" + strTitle); //mfc
00049     if (confirmBox) {
00050         // fill the hidden form value
00051         document.reserveHiddenForm.reserveID.value = intReserveID;
00052         // submit hidden form
00053         document.reserveHiddenForm.submit();
00054     }
00055 }
00056 </script>
00057 <!--reserve specific javascript functions end-->
00058 
00059 <!--item loan form-->
00060 <div style="padding: 5px; background-color: #CCCCCC;">
00061     <form name="reserveForm" id="search" action="circulation_action.php" method="post" style="display: inline;">
00062         <?php echo __('Search Collection'); ?> :<br />
00063         <?php
00064         // AJAX expression
00065         $ajax_exp = "ajaxFillSelect('item_AJAX_lookup_handler.php', 'item', 'i.item_code:title', 'reserveItemID', $('bib_search_str').getValue())";
00066         $biblio_options[] = array('0', 'Title');
00067         echo simbio_form_element::textField('text', 'bib_search_str', '', 'style="width: 10%;" onkeyup="'.$ajax_exp.'"');
00068         echo simbio_form_element::selectList('reserveItemID', $biblio_options, '', 'class="marginTop" style="width: 70%;"');
00069         echo simbio_form_element::textField('submit', 'addReserve', __('Add Reserve'));
00070         ?>
00071     </form>
00072 </div>
00073 <!--item loan form end-->

00075 <?php
00076 // check if there is member ID
00077 if (isset($_SESSION['memberID'])) {
00078     $memberID = trim($_SESSION['memberID']);
00079     $reserve_list_q = $dbs->query("SELECT r.*, b.title FROM reserve AS r
00080         LEFT JOIN biblio AS b ON r.biblio_id=b.biblio_id
00081         WHERE r.member_id='$memberID'");
00082 
00083     // create table object
00084     $reserve_list = new simbio_table();
00085     $reserve_list->table_attr = 'align="center" style="width: 100%;" cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0"';
00086     $reserve_list->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00087     $reserve_list->highlight_row = true;
00088     // table header
00089     $headers = array(__('Remove'), __('Title'), __('Item Code'), __('Reserve Date'));
00090     $reserve_list->setHeader($headers);
00091     // row number init
00092     $row = 1;
00093     while ($reserve_list_d = $reserve_list_q->fetch_assoc()) {
00094         // alternate the row color
00095         $row_class = ($row%2 == 0)?'alterCell':'alterCell2';
00096 
00097         // remove reserve link
00098         $remove_link = '<a href="#" onclick="confirmProcess('.$reserve_list_d['reserve_id'].', \''.$reserve_list_d['title'].'\')" title="Remove Reservation" class="trashLink">&nbsp;</a>';
00099         // check if item/collection is available
00100         $avail_q = $dbs->query("SELECT COUNT(loan_id) FROM loan WHERE item_code='".$reserve_list_d['item_code']."' AND is_lent=1 AND is_return=0");
00101         $avail_d = $avail_q->fetch_row();
00102         if ($avail_d[0] < 1) {
00103             $reserve_list_d['title'] .= ' - <strong>'.strtoupper(__('Available')).'</strong>';
00104         }
00105         // check if reservation are already expired
00106         if ( (strtotime(date('Y-m-d'))-strtotime($reserve_list_d['reserve_date']))/(3600*24) > $sysconf['reserve_expire_periode'] ) {
00107             $reserve_list_d['title'] .= ' - <strong style="color: red;">'.__('ALREADY EXPIRED').'</strong>';
00108         }
00109         // row colums array
00110         $fields = array(
00111             $remove_link,
00112             $reserve_list_d['title'],
00113             $reserve_list_d['item_code'],
00114             $reserve_list_d['reserve_date']
00115             );
00116 
00117         // append data to table row
00118         $reserve_list->appendTableRow($fields);
00119         // set the HTML attributes
00120         $reserve_list->setCellAttr($row, null, "valign='top' class='$row_class'");
00121         $reserve_list->setCellAttr($row, 0, "valign='top' align='center' class='$row_class' style='width: 5%;'");
00122         $reserve_list->setCellAttr($row, 1, "valign='top' class='$row_class' style='width: 70%;'");
00123 
00124         $row++;
00125     }
00126 
00127     echo $reserve_list->printTable();
00128     // hidden form for return and extend process
00129     echo '<form name="reserveHiddenForm" method="post" action="circulation_action.php"><input type="hidden" name="process" value="delete" /><input type="hidden" name="reserveID" value="" /></form>';
00130 }
00131 
00132 // get the buffered content
00133 $content = ob_get_clean();
00134 // include the page template
00135 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'/admin/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/notemplate_page_tpl.php';
